description: A graphic design and photo editing tool used for creating visual content.
A spreadsheet tool used for data analysis, calculations, and charting.
A presentation software used to create slideshows for meetings and lectures.
A collaborative interface design tool used for UI/UX design and prototyping.
An integrated development environment (IDE) by Microsoft for building applications.
A powerful IDE developed by JetBrains, commonly used for Java development.
An IDE specifically designed for Python development by JetBrains.
A platform for version control and code collaboration using Git.
A communication platform for teams, used for messaging and collaboration.
An all-in-one workspace for notes, tasks, wikis, and team collaboration.
A project management tool used for tracking issues and agile development.
A visual project management tool based on boards and cards for task tracking.
A video conferencing tool used for online meetings, webinars, and collaboration.
A platform that uses containerization to develop, ship, and run applications.
An open-source system for automating deployment and scaling of containerized apps.
A tool used for testing APIs by sending HTTP requests and viewing responses.
A data visualization tool that helps convert raw data into understandable insights.
An online design tool used to create graphics, presentations, and social media posts.
A content management system (CMS) used for building and managing websites.
A game development platform used to create 2D and 3D interactive experiences.
